item.title: Buried Alive
item.description: [[songs/k/kevin_morby/harlem_river/harlem_river.md#and-i-dont-know-vyl-wnanory|The light has come]] [[songs/k/kevin_morby/harlem_river/harlem_river.md#and-i-dont-know-vyl-wnanory|To take me]] [[songs/k/kevin_morby/harlem_river/harlem_river.md#and-i-dont-know-vyl-wnanory|(I think that I’m floating)]] [[songs/k/kevin_morby/harlem_river/harlem_river.md#and-i-dont-know-vyl-wnanory|Don’t know where I’m going]] [[songs/k/kevin_morby/harlem_river/harlem_river.md#and-i-dont-know-vyl-wnanory|Or what I’ll see]] [[songs/k/kevin_morby/harlem_river/harlem_river.
